A1 the number 16: We have got sixteen (people) coming for lunch. He dropped out of school at sixteen (= when he was 16 years old).
More examplesFewer examplesMany children leave school at sixteen.Jupiter has at least sixteen moons.sixteen, seventeen, eighteenWe've got sixteen people coming for lunch.Tests will be administered to schoolchildren at seven, twelve and sixteen years.
